modShortDescription: This mod is not Noisy Pants's own, just keeping it alive; it is the Sniper Turret with 50 Cal Ammo. Original author - GG2015; Noisy Pants updated it.
modDescription:
This mod is not Noisy Pants’s own, just keeping it alive; it is the [Sniper Turret with 50 Cal Ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/sniper-turret-and-50-cal-ammo/). Original author – GG2015; Noisy Pants updated it then added it to the trader inventory and gated behind level 5 Advanced Engineering.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HBnfUFWqS_9e5JFAAmVt_7F79TPdh19f/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21494-alucards-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Noisy Pants](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/noisy-pants/), GG2015
